t: Sales collapse forces 'woke' mega-brand to make humiliating U-turn and relist on Amazon | Daily Mail Online
s: 1 day ago - America's most popular shoe is coming back to Amazon. After a five-year hiatus, Nike shoes, clothing, and accessories are returning to the e-commerce giant. The athletic brand swiped its products from the platform in 2019, as part of a push to sell more directly to consumers.

t: Amazon retains crown as world’s most valuable brand
s: June 18, 2021 - This growth has been prompted in part by increased optimism about a possible end to the pandemic, as well as steps taken by the US government to boost the nation’s economic prospects post-lockdown. When it comes to the ranking, Amazon has a brand value of $683.9bn, up 64% compared to 2020.

t: Apple beats Amazon and Google to reclaim title of world’s most valuable brand
